_sText: Here I present to you my newest map, it's been too long since I uploaded a map here, I've been a "bit" ...Lazy :P Well finally I completed this map, I have currently changed the state to Beta, so if you guys find any bugs or glitches in the map, I will update them as soon as possible, and when there is nothing more to be find... I will make it Final About the map: It has - 32 Spawn points (16 for each team) - HDR - Custom In-game music (tetris) - Moving tetris blocks/pieces - 3D Skybox - Water - Ladders - Glass - Custom texture/decal - NAV file (Though I don't think the bots are clever enough to maneuver around everywhere xD) Now remember to Assess and leave me a comment, and if you find any bugs, please add that to the comment as well ^^, and as I did with my last maps, I made a video for it :D Check it out, it's in 1080p! If you add it to a server, tell me I would be glad to test it :D Now all I have to say is: Enjoy the map and have fun! Peace out! - ExtraOrdinary aka Remi749 Todo list:(Requested by public) - Add easier ways to get to higher level. - Make the tetris block kill people when they get crushed. - Fix the 3D skybox so that the tetrise's fall separately.
